\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[2025808143cfeef1a533055522aef4c5]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={166}
w_1 = \frac{m \sum x^{(i)} y^{(i)} - \sum x^{(i)} \sum y^{(i)}}
  {m \sum (x^{(i)})^2 - (\sum x^{(i)})^2}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={172}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[6851489da1983751f1011d2478c76d2b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={173}
w_0 = \frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1}^{m} y^{(i)} - w_1 \frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m} x^{(i)}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
